name: Colossus (itch) (Alessandro "Ordnas" Capriolo)
description:
As a viking you need to explore the land and unexpected threats.

The prototype features an over the shoulder free camera, using Unity Cinemachine to present the events in a continuous shot with no camera cuts or loading screens.

Controls (Keyboard / Controller):

WASD / Left Analog - Movement
Left Mouse / Right trigger - Weak Attack
Right Mouse / Y button - Strong Attack

Minimum system requirements: 
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i3-2130 or equivalent 
Memory:  8 GB RAM 
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270  
DirectX: Version 11 
Storage: 107 MB

Recommended system requirements: 
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10  
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent 
Memory: 8 GB RAM 
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 580 
DirectX: Version 11 
Storage: 107 MB
